translations.You are reaching your mailbox quota limi: You are reaching your mailbox quota limit for {account_email}
translations.You are currently using {percentage} of: You are currently using {percentage} of your mailbox storage. Please make some space by deleting unneeded emails.
translations.**💌 A mail app for Nextcloud**\n\n- **🚀:
**💌 A mail app for Nextcloud**

- **🚀 Integration with other Nextcloud apps!** Currently Contacts, Calendar & Files – more to come.
- **📥 Multiple mail accounts!** Personal and company account? No problem, and a nice unified inbox. Connect any IMAP account.
- **🔒 Send & receive encrypted mails!** Using the great [Mailvelope](https://mailvelope.com) browser extension.
- **🙈 We’re not reinventing the wheel!** Based on the great [Horde](https://horde.org) libraries.
- **📬 Want to host your own mail server?** We do not have to reimplement this as you could set up [Mail-in-a-Box](https://mailinabox.email)!

## Ethical AI Rating

### Priority Inbox

Positive:
* The software for training and inferencing of this model is open source.
* The model is created and trained on-premises based on the user's own data.
* The training data is accessible to the user, making it possible to check or correct for bias or optimise the performance and CO2 usage.

### Thread Summaries (opt-in)

**Rating:** 🟢/🟡/🟠/🔴

The rating depends on the installed text processing backend. See [the rating overview](https://docs.nextcloud.com/server/latest/admin_manual/ai/index.html) for details.

Learn more about the Nextcloud Ethical AI Rating [in our blog](https://nextcloud.com/blog/nextcloud-ethical-ai-rating/).

translations.Allow the app to collect data about your: Allow the app to collect data about your interactions. Based on this data, the app will adapt to your preferences. The data will only be stored locally.

translations.This message contains a verified digital: This message contains a verified digital S/MIME signature. The message wasn't changed since it was sent.
translations.This message contains an unverified digi: This message contains an unverified digital S/MIME signature. The message might have been changed since it was sent or the certificate of the signer is untrusted.

translations.Disable trash retention by leaving the f: Disable trash retention by leaving the field empty or setting it to 0. Only mails deleted after enabling trash retention will be processed.
No senders are trusted at the moment.
translations.The mail app allows users to read mails: The mail app allows users to read mails on their IMAP accounts.
translations.Here you can find instance-wide settings: Here you can find instance-wide settings. User specific settings are found in the app itself (bottom-left corner).
translations.A provisioning configuration will provis: A provisioning configuration will provision all accounts with a matching email address.
translations.Using the wildcard (*) in the provisioni: Using the wildcard (*) in the provisioning domain field will create a configuration that applies to all users, provided they do not match another configuration.
translations.The provisioning mechanism will prioriti: The provisioning mechanism will prioritise specific domain configurations over the wildcard domain configuration.
translations.Should a new matching configuration be f: Should a new matching configuration be found after the user was already provisioned with another configuration, the new configuration will take precedence and the user will be reprovisioned with the configuration.
translations.There can only be one configuration per: There can only be one configuration per domain and only one wildcard domain configuration.
translations.These settings can be used in conjunctio: These settings can be used in conjunction with each other.
translations.If you only want to provision one domain: If you only want to provision one domain for all users, use the wildcard (*).
translations.This setting only makes most sense if yo: This setting only makes most sense if you use the same user back-end for your Nextcloud and mail server of your organization.
translations.Allow additional Mail accounts from User: Allow additional Mail accounts from User Settings
translations.You can set up an anti spam service emai: You can set up an anti spam service email address here.
translations.Any email that is marked as spam will be: Any email that is marked as spam will be sent to the anti spam service.
translations.Gmail allows users to access their email: Gmail allows users to access their email via IMAP. For security reasons this access is only possible with an OAuth 2.0 connection or Google accounts that use two-factor authentication and app passwords.
translations.You have to register a new Client ID for: You have to register a new Client ID for a "Web application" in the Google Cloud console. Add the URL {url} as authorized redirect URI.
translations.Microsoft allows users to access their e: Microsoft allows users to access their email via IMAP. For security reasons this access is only possible with an OAuth 2.0 connection.
translations.You have to register a new app in the Mi: You have to register a new app in the Microsoft Azure Active Directory portal. Add the URL {url} as redirect URI.
translations.There was an error when provisioning acc: There was an error when provisioning accounts.
translations.Successfully deleted and deprovisioned a: Successfully deleted and deprovisioned accounts for "{domain}"
translations.Error when deleting and deprovisioning a: Error when deleting and deprovisioning accounts for "{domain}"
translations.Add the email address of your anti spam: Add the email address of your anti spam report service here.
translations.When using this setting, a report email: When using this setting, a report email will be sent to the SPAM report server when a user clicks "Mark as spam".
translations.The original message will be attached as: The original message will be attached as a "message/rfc822" attachment.
translations.Successfully set up anti spam email addr: Successfully set up anti spam email addresses
translations.Error saving anti spam email addresses: Error saving anti spam email addresses
translations.Successfully deleted anti spam reporting: Successfully deleted anti spam reporting email
translations.Error deleting anti spam reporting email: Error deleting anti spam reporting email
translations.The LDAP aliases integration reads an at: The LDAP aliases integration reads an attribute from the configured LDAP directory to provision email aliases.
translations.A multi value attribute to provision ema: A multi value attribute to provision email aliases. For each value an alias is created. Aliases existing in Nextcloud which are not in the LDAP directory are deleted.
translations.* %USERID% and %EMAIL% will be replaced: * %USERID% and %EMAIL% will be replaced with the user's UID and email
translations.With the settings above, the app will cr: With the settings above, the app will create account settings in the following way:
translations.The private key is only required if you: The private key is only required if you intend to send signed and encrypted emails using this certificate.
translations.The provided PKCS #12 certificate must c: The provided PKCS #12 certificate must contain at least one certificate and exactly one private key.
translations.Failed to import the certificate. Please: Failed to import the certificate. Please check the password.
Failed to import the certificate. Please make sure that the private key matches the certificate and is not protected by a passphrase.
